params.owner: The address that owns the WETH.
params.spender: The address that is approved to transfer the WETH.

returns._0: The amount of WETH that the spender can transfer on behalf of the owner.

params.guy: The address that is approved to transfer the WETH.
params.wad: The amount that is approved to transfer.

returns._0: True if the approval was successful.

params.owner: The address to query the balance of.

returns._0: The balance of the given address.
The number of decimals the token uses.
The withdrawal delay in seconds.

params._guy: The address to recover the WETH from.
params._wad: The amount of WETH to recover.

returns._0: The name of the token.

params._wad: The amount of WETH to recover.

returns._0: The symbol of the token.
The total supply of WETH.

params.dst: The address to transfer the WETH to.
params.wad: The amount of WETH to transfer.

returns._0: True if the transfer was successful.

params.dst: The address to transfer the WETH to.
params.src: The address to transfer the WETH from.
params.wad: The amount of WETH to transfer.

returns._0: True if the transfer was successful.

params._wad: The amount of WETH to unlock.
The amount of WETH to withdraw.

params.wad: The amount of ETH to withdraw.

params._guy: Sub-account to query the withdrawal request of.
params._owner: The address to query the withdrawal request of.

returns._0: The withdrawal request for the given address-subaccount pair.

allowance(address,address).notice: Returns the amount of WETH that the spender can transfer on behalf of the owner.

approve(address,uint256).notice: Approves the given address to transfer the WETH on behalf of the caller.

balanceOf(address).notice: Returns the balance of the given address.

decimals().notice: Returns the number of decimals the token uses.

delay().notice: Returns the withdrawal delay in seconds.

deposit().notice: Allows WETH to be deposited by sending ether to the contract.

hold(address,uint256).notice: Allows the owner to recover from error cases by pulling ETH from a specific owner.

name().notice: Returns the name of the token.

recover(uint256).notice: Allows the owner to recover from error cases by pulling ETH out of the contract.

symbol().notice: Returns the symbol of the token.

totalSupply().notice: Returns the total supply of WETH.

transfer(address,uint256).notice: Transfers the given amount of WETH to the given address.

transferFrom(address,address,uint256).notice: Transfers the given amount of WETH from the given address to the given address.

unlock(address,uint256).notice: Unlocks withdrawals for the sender's account, after a time delay.

withdraw(address,uint256).notice: Extension to withdrawal, must provide a sub-account to withdraw from.

withdrawals(address,address).notice: Returns a withdrawal request for the given address.

Deposit(address,uint256).notice: Emitted when a deposit is made.

Transfer(address,address,uint256).notice: Emitted when a transfer is made.

Unwrap(address,uint256).notice: Emitted when an unwrap is started.

Withdrawal(address,uint256).notice: Emitted when a withdrawal is made.
